title: >>> SOUR CREAM
body_text:
The pomp, the pageantry; the desire and the determination; the will to win and the unforgettable memories forever embedded into the hearts and minds of all those who witnessed first-hand the once in a lifetime spectacular, DODGEBALL 100.
DODGEBALL 100: The one and only ... now rank it.
10 ... Can't wait to tell my kids.
9 ... Unbelievably successful.
8 ... A great time.
7 ... Pleasing.
6 ... Not too shabby.
5 ... ehhh.
4 ... Rather disappointed.
3 ... Pretty awful.
2 ... I'm glad I left early.
1 ... Thank God it only happens once.
And with that said, the sport ushers in the beginning of an unprecedented 11th Season ...
The
CREAMation 3
?
In one hundred awe-inspiring, wildly insane events, we've celebrated multiple birthdays, witnessed horrific incidents and injuries, and opponents literally "cream" their rivals, which brings us to our next match-up.
Bet you were hoping for the traditional
CREAMation Rules
Match at this Saturday's DODGEBALL 101. Well if there's one thing life has taught us, sometimes the story doesn't always go according to planned.
Dodgeball.livejournal.com
regrets to inform you that the highly-anticipated
CREAMation 3
encounter between heated rivals
Kevin Fitzpatrick
and
Chris Adams
for August 25 will be postponed until further notice. Unfortunately, the legendary "Fitz" will be out of action due to a conflicting work schedule. You can only imagine his disappointment and frustration as the chance to publicly humiliate and embarrass his arch nemesis Adams will simply have to wait. This is not the first time the award-winning icon has been forced out of competition as those who competed during the brutally low temperatures of February will likely remember the same occurrence taking place at
DODGEBALL 75
.
In all hopes, their long-awaited rematch will indeed occur sometime within the next few weeks.
The New Main Event
With the mega
Adams/Fitzpatrick
clash now on hold, who is headlining this 101st show is still up in the air. Star-studded matches and ideas have been thrown out, but nothing has been finalized and DODGEBALL 101 is left without a scheduled confrontation.
Be sure to check back as Saturday draws near for more on this developing story.
body_html:
The pomp, the pageantry; the desire and the determination; the will to win and the unforgettable memories forever embedded into the hearts and minds of all those who witnessed first-hand the once in a lifetime spectacular, DODGEBALL 100.

DODGEBALL 100: The one and only ... now rank it.
  

And with that said, the sport ushers in the beginning of an unprecedented 11th Season ...

The CREAMation 3?
In one hundred awe-inspiring, wildly insane events, we've celebrated multiple birthdays, witnessed horrific incidents and injuries, and opponents literally "cream" their rivals, which brings us to our next match-up.

Bet you were hoping for the traditional CREAMation Rules Match at this Saturday's DODGEBALL 101. Well if there's one thing life has taught us, sometimes the story doesn't always go according to planned.

Dodgeball.livejournal.com regrets to inform you that the highly-anticipated CREAMation 3 encounter between heated rivals Kevin Fitzpatrick and Chris Adams for August 25 will be postponed until further notice. Unfortunately, the legendary "Fitz" will be out of action due to a conflicting work schedule. You can only imagine his disappointment and frustration as the chance to publicly humiliate and embarrass his arch nemesis Adams will simply have to wait. This is not the first time the award-winning icon has been forced out of competition as those who competed during the brutally low temperatures of February will likely remember the same occurrence taking place at DODGEBALL 75.

In all hopes, their long-awaited rematch will indeed occur sometime within the next few weeks.

The New Main Event
With the mega Adams/Fitzpatrick clash now on hold, who is headlining this 101st show is still up in the air. Star-studded matches and ideas have been thrown out, but nothing has been finalized and DODGEBALL 101 is left without a scheduled confrontation.

Be sure to check back as Saturday draws near for more on this developing story.
